name: Himanshu Chitoria
Who are you?: I am Himanshu Chitoria, a Computer Science student at IIT Madras pursuing a B.Tech and a part-time B.Sc. in Data Science.
What is your educational background?: I am currently enrolled in Bachelor of Technology - Computer Science and Engineering at Vellore Institute of Technology, Bhopal, and pursuing Bachelor of Science in Data Science at IIT Madras.
Where are you located?: I am based in Charkhi Dadri, Haryana, India.
How can I contact you?: You can reach me at +91 98963 89035 or via email at himanshuchitoria88@gmail.com. Also, you can find me on LinkedIn at https://www.linkedin.com/in/himansuchitoria or GitHub at https://github.com/himanshuchitoria
What programming languages do you know?: I am proficient in C, C++, Python, JavaScript, Java, HTML, and CSS.
What are your technical skills?: I have expertise in frameworks and libraries such as TensorFlow, Keras, OpenCV, React.js, Next.js, TypeScript, Node.js, Express.js, and REST APIs. I am also experienced with MongoDB, Firebase, MySQL, and AWS cloud services.
Do you have experience with cloud platfo: Yes, I have hands-on experience with AWS, MongoDB, Firebase, and relational databases like MySQL.
Tell me about your internship experience: I interned at IDEMIA as a Facial Recognition/Computer Vision intern, ValU5Healthcare as a Software Development Engineer intern where I worked on HIPAA-compliant APIs, and Hitachi Pvt. Ltd focusing on AWS infrastructure automation.
What types of projects have you worked o: My notable projects include DevSync, a real-time developer collaboration tool built with MERN stack, FinSave, an AI-based personal finance tracker, and TrendHire, an AI-powered resume optimizer and job matcher.
What are your hobbies?: I enjoy coding personal projects, exploring healthcare technologies, competing in programming challenges, and contributing to open-source software.
What certifications do you hold?: I have earned certifications in Data Fundamentals by IBM, Cloud Computing by NPTEL, Python Essentials by Vityarthi, and Computer Networking from Google.
What programming languages are you comfo: I am comfortable with C/C++, Python, and JavaScript, along with web development languages like HTML and CSS.
What kind of developer are you?: I am a full-stack web developer with a focus on healthcare technology, cybersecurity, and scalable cloud applications.
Are you involved in any extracurricular: Yes, I have led the design team at the Data Science Club in VIT Bhopal and was part of the editorial team managing tech content.
What are your strengths?: My strengths include problem solving, full-stack development, cloud computing, cybersecurity practices, and applying AI in healthcare solutions.
What programming frameworks do you use?: I have used React.js, Next.js for frontend development, and Node.js with Express.js for backend APIs.
How can you help with cybersecurity?: I have experience implementing AWS IAM best practices, secure coding patterns, and building HIPAA-compliant applications.
Where can I see your code or projects?: You can visit my GitHub at https://github.com/himanshuchitoria to see my projects and contributions.
What languages do you speak?: I am fluent in Hindi, English, and Japanese.
What is your current academic status?: I am currently completing my B.Tech in Computer Science at VIT Bhopal and part-time B.Sc. in Data Science at IIT Madras.
Can you work with AI/ML?: Yes, I have experience using TensorFlow, Keras and OpenCV for AI and machine learning projects.
DevSync is a real-time collaboration tool I developed using MERN stack and WebSockets, enabling synchronized coding sessions with JWT authentication and role-based access control.
I worked on FinSave, an AI-powered personal finance tracker using OCR and machine learning for transaction categorization, and TrendHire, an AI-based resume optimizer using LangChain and OpenAI embeddings.

How do you prepare for interviews?: I have solved over 250 data structures and algorithms problems on platforms like LeetCode and GeeksforGeeks, focusing on system design and coding challenges.
What is your career goal?: To build innovative healthcare technology solutions and secure scalable systems using AI and cloud computing.
How do you work in teams?: I have led design teams and collaborated in development projects maintaining version control, code reviews, and CI/CD practices.
What is your approach to learning new te: I engage in hands-on projects, contribute to open source, and follow latest tech trends through technical papers and conferences.
What is your availability?: I am currently available for internship and full-time software engineering roles starting post October 2026.
Languages for coding?: Primarily Python, Java, JavaScript, and C/C++.
